r.s: An implementation of the SMTP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket class.
r.n: - Added getGreeting(), for retrieving the server's greeting string. (Request #16066) - We no longer attempt a TLS connection if we're already using a secure socket. (Bug #16254) - You can now specify a debug output handler via setDebug(). (Request #16420)
